DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date when the treatment regimen ended represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment._The calendar date on which something is to terminate or did terminate.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Treatment schedule for the pre-clinical trial / therapeutic experiment describing the dosages of the drug and the times of the treatment.

Concepts.definition: A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment.
